response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to me, reflecting its exceptional quality and rarity. I understand its significance to you, as it is valued at $800,000 to you. To ensure a mutually beneficial transaction, I propose to sell this product to you at a price of $1,200,000. This offer not only reflects the true worth of the product but also allows you to secure it at a competitive price. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of completing this transaction soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
